an5.28:1.1.en: “Mendicants, I will teach you how to [38;5;121mdevelop noble right immersion[0m with five factors.

an5.28:2.1.pli: “Katamā ca, bhikkhave, ariyassa pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa bhāvanā?
an5.28:2.1.en: “And how do you [38;5;121mdevelop noble right immersion[0m with five factors?

an5.28:2.7.pli: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ paṭhamā bhāvanā. #1
an5.28:2.7.en: This is the first way to [38;5;121mdevelop noble right immersion[0m with five factors.

an5.28:3.8.pli: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ dutiyā bhāvanā. #2
an5.28:3.8.en: This is the second way to [38;5;121mdevelop noble right immersion[0m with five factors.

an5.28:4.9.pli: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ tatiyā bhāvanā. #3
an5.28:4.9.en: This is the third way to [38;5;121mdevelop noble right immersion[0m with five factors.

an5.28:5.8.pli: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ catutthā bhāvanā. #4
an5.28:5.8.en: This is the fourth way to [38;5;121mdevelop noble right immersion[0m with five factors.

an5.28:6.4.pli: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ pañcamā bhāvanā. #5
an5.28:6.4.en: This is the fifth way to [38;5;121mdevelop noble right immersion[0m with five factors.
